sentences.en: Carrie was now lightened by a touch of this divine afflatus.
sentences.cn: 神圣的灵感使嘉莉变得神采奕奕.

sentences.en: So the afflatus of clothing design must be pursued from all - around and multiple directions.
sentences.cn: 因此要从多角度、多层次、多方位去寻求服装设计的灵感.

sentences.en: Though me the afflatus surging and surging , though me the current and index.
sentences.cn: 透过我,灵感源源不断的奔流; 透过我,潮流和指标不断涌现.

sentences.en: Through me the afflatus surging and surging, through me the current and index.
sentences.cn: 透过我,灵感源源不绝的奔流; 流过我,潮流和指标不断涌现.

sentences.en: Were did your afflatus come from?
sentences.cn: 请问你的灵感是从那里来的?
